trans-unit.source: Contains information on a tracked <xref href="System.Activities.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Innehåller information om en spårade <xref href="System.Activities.Activity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo"></xref> class using the specified name, ID, instance ID and type name.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo"> </xref> klass med det angivna namnet ID, instans-ID och typnamn.

trans-unit.source: The name of the activity.
The activity ID.
The instance ID of the activity.
The type name of the activity.
Gets the ID for the activity.
The activity ID.
Gets the run-time ID of the activity instance.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ID för körning av Aktivitetsinstansen.

trans-unit.source: An activity can occur multiple times during processing, such as an activity that is processed within a loop.
trans-unit.target: En aktivitet kan förekomma flera gånger under bearbetning, till exempel en aktivitet som bearbetas i en loop.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo.Id%2A> contains the ID of the activity and does not change while the InstanceId contains the ID of the specific instance of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo.Id%2A>innehåller ID för aktiviteten och ändras inte när InstanceId innehåller ID för den specifika instansen av aktiviteten.</xref:System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: The InstanceId is different for each specific instance.
trans-unit.target: InstanceId är olika för varje specifik instans.

trans-unit.source: For example, an activity that is processed in a loop would have a different InstanceId for each cycle through the loop while the <xref:System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo.Id%2A> would remain the same.
trans-unit.target: Till exempel en aktivitet som bearbetas i en slinga skulle ha en annan InstanceId för varje cykel loopen när den <xref:System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo.Id%2A>är densamma.</xref:System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: The instance ID of the activity.
Gets the name associated with the activity
trans-unit.target: Hämtar namnet som associeras med aktiviteten

trans-unit.source: The activity name.
Gets a string representation of the <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo"></xref> object
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en strängrepresentation av den <xref href="System.Activities.Tracking.ActivityInfo"> </xref> objekt

trans-unit.source: The activity name, ID, instance ID and type name.
Gets the type name of the activity.
The type name of the activity.
